resources.string: ► Choose the file type you wish to search for from the dropbox.
► Type a short search phrase and click Search!
► Tap through the first few results and you should find your file or song.
► Tap the filename to view/hear it, or touch and hold on the filename to save it to your device.
► Fewer keywords in your search phrase usually gives better results.
► Feel free to add your own, custom filters when searching.
► Press your Menu button for added options and links.
► Leave a comment if you like GoogHacks Lite or have a suggestion!
